TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {190389=Exposure Lights are designed and manufactured to exacting standards in the UK by Ultimate Sports Engineering Ltd, USE Ltd. The founders of Exposure had been riding and racing bikes in the dark since 1997 and unsatisfied with other lighting systems they recognised that the future of lighting was LED technology. In 2005 they launched the Exposure Lights brand and a revolution in lighting technology began.}
